titleStmt.title: A deuout treatyse called the tree [and] xii. frutes of the holy goost
Tree and xii. frutes of the holy goost.

notesStmt.note: In two parts, each with separate title page, pagination, register and colophon. Part 1 colophon reads "Enprynted at London in the Fletestrete, at the sygne of the rose Garlande. by Robert Coplande. Anno d[om]. M.CCCCC.xxxiiij." Part 2 title page reads "The .xij. fruytes of the holy goost.".
Imprint from colophon of part 2, as transcribed in STC.
Imperfect; leaves A1 and V4 are present in pen facsimiles; second colophon not filmed.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
